torus[source]

torus(n=2000, c=2, a=1, noise=None, seed=None)

Sample n data points on a torus. Modified from tadasets.shapes â€” TaDAsets 0.1.0 documentation Uses rejection sampling

Parameters

n : int Number of data points in shape. c : float Distance from center to center of tube. a : float Radius of tube. ambient : int, default=None Embed the torus into a space with ambient dimension equal to ambient. The torus is randomly rotated in this high dimensional space. seed : int, default=None Seed for random state.
